snippet.title: Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus Trailer 1998
snippet.description:
Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus Trailer 1998

Official Content From GT Interactive

Say goodbye to the motto 'shoot now and ask questions later'. This game relies on communication rather than termination. The goal is to talk your way through the game to get what you want.
Platforms: Sony PlayStation, PC CD

Sony PlayStation, PC CD
, Adventure,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus
